75  class LatticeView : public BaseView {
76  public:
80 
81  LatticeView(unsigned int ArOrder = 1)
82  :
83  mOrder(ArOrder),
84  mErrorForward(2, ArOrder + 1),
85  mErrorBackward(2, ArOrder + 1),
86  mParcorF(ArOrder + 1),
87  mParcorB(ArOrder + 1) {
88  mErrorForward.clear();
89  mErrorBackward.clear();
90  mParcorF.clear();
91  mParcorB.clear();
92  }

96  ~LatticeView() {
97  }

99  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
100  eternity::xml_archive fa;
101  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
102  xml_serialize(fa, "");
103  fa.close();
104  }
105 
106  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
107  eternity::xml_archive fa;
108  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
109  xml_serialize(fa, "");
110  fa.close();
111  }
112 
113  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive& xml, const char* prefix) {
114  char buffer[1024];
115 
116  if (xml.is_loading()) {
117 
118  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", prefix);
119  xml.read(buffer, mOrder, 0);
120  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrorForward", prefix);
121  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrorForward, xml, buffer);
122  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrorBackward", prefix);
123  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrorBackward, xml, buffer);
124  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorF", prefix);
125  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorF, xml, buffer);
126  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorB", prefix);
127  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorB, xml, buffer);
128  } else {
129  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", prefix);
130  xml.write(buffer, mOrder);
131  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrorForward", prefix);
132  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrorForward, xml, buffer);
133  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrorBackward", prefix);
134  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrorBackward, xml, buffer);
135  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorF", prefix);
136  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorF, xml, buffer);
137  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorB", prefix);
138  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorB, xml, buffer);
139  }
140  }
